mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.zwh zwh, t.zwlb zwlb, t.cklx cklx, t.zwmj zwmj, t.zwzt zwzt, t.qyid qyid, t.zwkd zwkd, t.zwcd zwcd, t.zwmc zwmc, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, t.zgid zgid, t.bhzh bhzh, t.bhzt bhzt, t.bhzc bhzc, t.bhzs bhzs, t.mczt mczt, t.mczh mczh, t.mczc mczc, t.mczs mczs
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM CFPA_ZW_JBXX t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and t.reserve1 is not null

SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM CFPA_ZW_JBXX t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and t.reserve1 is not null

SELECT
FROM CFPA_ZW_JBXX t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and t.reserve1 is not null
ORDER BY T.CJSJ

SELECT , (CASE sa.usertype WHEN 'CHN' THEN q.zwgsmc WHEN 'ENG' THEN q.ywgsmc ELSE '' END) qymc, q.gsjc FROM CFPA_ZW_JBXX t left join CFPA_QY_JBXX q on t.qyid = q.qyid and q.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' left join sys_account sa on sa.userid = q.userid and sa.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.UUID = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CFPA_ZW_JBXX(uuid,zwh,zwlb,cklx,zwmj,zwzt,qyid,zwkd,zwcd,zwmc,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,zgid,bhzh,bhzt,bhzc,bhzs,mczt,mczh,mczc,mczs) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zwh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zwlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cklx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zwmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zwzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zwkd,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zwcd,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},SYSDATE,#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE},#{zgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bhzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bhzc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bhzs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mczt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mczh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mczc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mczs,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE CFPA_ZW_JBXX t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.UUID = #{value}

INSERT INTO CFPA_ZW_JBXX(uuid,zwh,zwlb,cklx,zwmj,zwzt,qyid,zwkd,zwcd,zwmc,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,zgid,bhzh,bhzt,bhzc,bhzs,mczt,mczh,mczc,mczs) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.zwh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zwh,#{item.zwlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zwlb,#{item.cklx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cklx,#{item.zwmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zwmj,#{item.zwzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zwzt,#{item.qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} qyid,#{item.zwkd,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zwkd,#{item.zwcd,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zwcd,#{item.zwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zwmc,'N' delete_flag,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4,#{item.zgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zgid,#{item.bhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bhzh,#{item.bhzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bhzt,#{item.bhzc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bhzc,#{item.bhzs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bhzs,#{item.mczt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} mczt,#{item.mczh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} mczh,#{item.mczc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} mczc,#{item.mczs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} mczs
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), zwh = VALUES(zwh), zwlb = VALUES(zwlb), cklx = VALUES(cklx), zwmj = VALUES(zwmj), zwzt = VALUES(zwzt), qyid = VALUES(qyid), zwkd = VALUES(zwkd), zwcd = VALUES(zwcd), zwmc = VALUES(zwmc), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4), zgid = VALUES(zgid), bhzh = VALUES(bhzh), bhzt = VALUES(bhzt), bhzc = VALUES(bhzc), bhzs = VALUES(bhzs), mczt = VALUES(mczt), mczh = VALUES(mczh), mczc = VALUES(mczc), mczs = VALUES(mczs)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM CFPA_ZW_JBXX t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , (CASE sa.usertype WHEN 'CHN' THEN q.zwgsmc WHEN 'ENG' THEN q.ywgsmc ELSE '' END) qymc, q.gsjc, q.lxr, q.lxrsj, c2.code_name||c4.code_name||q.yjdzxx yjdzxx FROM CFPA_ZW_JBXX t left join CFPA_QY_JBXX q on t.qyid = q.qyid and q.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' left join sys_account sa on sa.userid = q.userid and sa.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c2.CODEID = c1.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and q.yjdzsheng = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and q.yjdzshi = c4.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and t.reserve1 is not null
and ((q.zwgsmc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{qymc}),'%') ESCAPE '\' and sa.usertype = 'CHN') or (q.ywgsmc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{qymc}),'%') ESCAPE '\' and sa.usertype = 'ENG'))
ORDER BY substr(t.zwh,1,4) asc, to_number(TRANSLATE (replace(t.zwh,'-',''),'0123456789'||replace(t.zwh,'-',''),'0123456789')) asc
mapper.update: UPDATE CFPA_ZW_JBXX T SET xgsj=sysdate, delete_flag='Y' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
